idx.md

Agent-first markdown library. Browse the index, then fetch HEAD/BODY per topic.

Start: https://idx.md/SKILL.md
Index: https://idx.md/data/index.md
By capability: https://idx.md/category/index.md

HEAD: https://idx.md/{topic} (alias of /data/{topic}/HEAD.md)
BODY: https://idx.md/{topic}/BODY.md

Sitemap: https://idx.md/sitemap.xml
